It's an ok card.

Posted By: VirusVescichetta (2/27/2012 8:28:19 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Considering [Royal Assassin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Royal Assassin), I think this could have been an instant, though it'd have to be heavier in the colored cost in that case, like {1}{B}{B}. Yes, it takes out most attacking creatures... but it doesn't take out creatures with Vigilance, so there'd still be a nice balance between it and [Doom Blade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Doom Blade), as an instant [Assassinate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Assassinate) effect couldn't take out Serra Angel but could get [Phyrexian Obliterator](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Phyrexian Obliterator), whereas Doom Blade would be reversed.
posts.html:
